name: I FLEW TO THE END OF THE WORLD TO GET A REPLY TO AN EMAIL!
description:
▶︎ Support ME and become a PATRON to join my WhatsApp Group and many more perks! 

https://www.patreon.com/joshcahill

This is me chasing Air Greenland's brand new Airbus A330-800neo on a special mission to Greenland's Capital Nuuk to surprise their Marketing Manager.

Class: Economy
Route: Copenhagen (CPH) to Nuuk (GOH) via Kangerlussuaq (SFJ)
Plane: Airbus A330-200 & Dash 8-200

▶︎ Follow me on Instagram, Facebook, TikTok and Twitter!

https://instagram.com/gotravelyourway
https://www.facebook.com/gotravelyourway
https://twitter.com/gotravelyourway
https://www.tiktok.com/@gotravelyourway

▶︎ My Website: http://www.gotravelyourway.com
▶︎ Email Contact: gotravelyourway@gmail.com
